cards.rules_text:
{2}, {T}: Sacrifice Wholesome Milk.
{1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Wholesome Milk: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Wholesome Milk is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

Flying, haste
{2}, {T}: Sacrifice Soul Food.
When Soul Food dies, you gain 3 life.
cards.notes: Not in love with the art here, but it was the best I could find.

cards.rules_text:
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Uplifting Brew: You gain 3 life.
When Uplifting Brew leaves the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn.

{2}, {T}: Sacrifice Brain Food.
{1}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Brain Food: Scry 1, then draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Brain Food is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Puff Partner
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Puff Partner: You gain life equal to Puff Partner’s power.

{2}, {T}: Sacrifice Poisoned Apple.
{1}{B}, {T}: Sacrifice Poisoned Apple: Each opponent loses 3 life. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Poisoned Apple is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

Whenever a creature dealt combat damage by Carnivorous Vegetable this turn dies, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Carnivorous Vegetable: You gain 3 life.

Energy Drink enters tapped.
{T}: Add {C}. This mana can’t be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Energy Drink: You gain 3 life.

{2}, {T}: Sacrifice Inferno Sauce.
{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Inferno Sauce: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Inferno Sauce is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

Haste
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Buns in the Oven: You gain 3 life.
When Buns in the Oven leaves the battlefield, if it isn’t a token, create a token that’s a copy of it.

{T}, Sacrifice Exotic Chocolate Coin: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, Sacrifice Exotic Chocolate Coin: Draw a card.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Exotic Chocolate Coin: You gain 3 life.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Exotic Chocolate Coin: Create two tokens that are copies of it.

{2}, {T}: Sacrifice Winter Produce.
{1}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice Winter Produce: Create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.
When Winter Produce is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

When Boundless Cornucopia enters, draw a card.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Boundless Cornucopia: You gain 3 life.
When Boundless Cornucopia is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, its owner shuffles it into their library.

When Color Pie enters, scry 2.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Color Pie: Add two mana in any combination of colors. You gain 3 life.

When Two-for-One Special enters, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Two-for-One Special: You gain 3 life.

{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Delectable Delta: You gain 3 life.

Flash
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Transmutive Tonic: You gain 3 life.
When you sacrifice Transmutive Tonic, until end of turn, target creature has base power and toughness 10/10 and gains trample and “At the beginning of the end step, exile this creature and create a 3/3 green Elk creature token.”

Vigilance
When Watermelephant enters or leaves the battlefield, return target nonland permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Watermelephant: You gain 3 life.

When Oblivionion Ring enters, exile another target nonland permanent until Oblivionion Ring leaves the battlefield.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Oblivionion Ring: You gain 3 life.

First strike
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Tabascobra: You gain 3 life.
When Tabascobra dies, it deals 3 damage to each player.

Foods you control have “{T}: You gain 1 life.”
At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice a Food.

Trample
Gormet Golem’s power and toughness are each equal to the number of Foods you control.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gormet Golem: You gain 3 life.

Whenever you sacrifice a Food, you get {V} [i](a research counter)[/i].
As long as you have ten or more {V}, you may pay {0} rather than pay the mana cost for artifact spells you cast.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Cake Boss: You gain 3 life and get {V}.

You may have Imposter Cake enters as a copy of an artifact or creature an opponent controls, except it’s a Food artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life” and it loses all other card types.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Imposter Cake: You gain 3 life.

Delve [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Treasure Brews: Draw three cards. Activate only as a sorcery.

Prowess [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
Reef Wellington can’t be blocked as long as you’ve cast two or more noncreature spells this turn.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Reef Wellington: You gain 3 life.
When Reef Wellington dies, draw a card for each noncreature spell you’ve cast this turn.

Lifelink
When Cantelope enters, search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Cantelope: You gain 3 life.
When Cantelope leaves the battlefield, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Plate of Leftovers: You gain 3 life.
When Plate of Leftovers leaves the battlefield, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]

Sacrifice a Food: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Delectable Altar: You gain 3 life.
cards.notes: Keep an eye on this in standard

cards.rules_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Rotted Roast: You gain 3 life, then each creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is equal to the amount of life you gained this turn or the amount of life you lost this turn, whichever is greater. Activate only as a sorcery.

When Thoughtcheese enters, you lose 2 life.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Thoughtcheese: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You gain 3 life. Activate only as a sorcery.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sauerkraut Elder: You gain 3 life.
When Sauerkraut Elder dies, search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

{T}, Sacrifice a Food: You gain 3 life.
{T}, Sacrifice two Foods: Draw a card.
{T}, Sacrifice three Foods: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
{T}, Sacrifice four Foods: You may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
{5}: Untap Staff of Confection.

Frosted Ballista enters with X +1/+1 counters on it.
{4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Frosted Ballista.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Frosted Ballista: Frosted Ballista deals damage equal to its power to any target.
When Frosted Ballista dies, you gain life equal to its power.

Trample, prowess
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wurmboil Engine: You gain 3 life.
When Wurmboil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Food Wurm artifact creature token with trample and a 3/3 colorless Food Wurm artifact creature token with prowess. Each of those tokens also has “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: You gain 3 life.”

Cumulative upkeep {1} [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)[/i]
Whenever Hot Potato’s cumulative upkeep is paid, target opponent gains control of it.
When Hot Potato is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals damage to its controller equal to the number of age counters on it.
{2}, {T}: Put an age counter on Hot Potato.

Storm [i](When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies. Copies become tokens.)[/i]
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Crepe Shot: Crepe Shot deals 1 damage to any target. Activate only as a sorcery.

Morph {1} [i](You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)[/i]
{2}, {T}: Sacrifice Secret Ingredient.
When Secret Ingredient is turned face up or leaves the battlefield [i](while it’s face-up)[/i], you gain 3 life.
{2}, {T}: You gain 3 life.

Trample
When Gravy Train enters, create two Food tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Crew 3
Sacrifice a Food: You gain 3 life. Gravy Train becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.

{T}: Add {G} for each Food you control.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grapevine Harvester: You gain 3 life.

Trample
Whenever a creature dealt combat damage by Colossal Breadmaw this turn dies, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Colossal Breadmaw: You gain 3 life.

{T}: Until end of turn, target nonland permanent becomes a Food artifact in addition to its other types and gains “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Irresistible Coating: You gain 3 life.

{T}: Put a charge counter on Cherry Bomb.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Cherry Bomb: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Cherry Bomb.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Cherry Bomb: You gain life equal to the number of charge counters on Cherry Bomb.
{X}, {T}, Sacrifice All You Can Eat Buffet: You gain X life.

Whenever an opponent draws one or more cards, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn’t, you create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Smothering Thyme: You gain 3 life.

Vigilance
When Prince of the Pie enters create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{G}{W}, Sacrifice another Food: Put a permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard on top of your library. You gain 3 life.

{T}: Scry 1.
{2}, {T}: You gain 3 life and draw a card. Then put Sensei’s Divining Tea on top of its owner’s library.

Flying
Whenever Sphinx of the Final Meal deals combat damage to a player, create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
If you would gain life, scry that many cards instead.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sphinx of the Final Meal: Scry 3.

Trample
When Beefy Broodling enters create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{R}{G}, Sacrifice a Food: Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control. You gain 3 life.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Veal.
{T}: You may put a noncreature artifact card with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Veal from your hand onto the battlefield.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Aether Veal: You gain life equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Veal.

Each nonland permanent card in your graveyard has decompose into Food. The decompose cost is equal to its mana cost. [i](Pay that card’s decompose cost and exile it from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Food artifact with “{2}, {T}: Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life,” and it loses all other card types.)[/i]
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Underworld Bread and you gain 3 life.

Whenever you activate an ability of a Food, if {W} was spent to activate it, create a 1/1 white Human creature token. If {U} was spent to activate it, scry 2. If {B} was spent to activate it, each opponent loses 2 life. If {R} was spent to activate it, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. If {G} was spent to activate it, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Taffin, Lord of the Feast: You gain 3 life.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wheel of Cheddar: Each player may discard their hand. If they do, they draw seven cards. Activate only as a sorcery.

Lifelink
When Decadent Dragon enters create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{U}{B}, Sacrifice a Food: Create a tapped Treasure token. You gain 3 life. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]

Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from artifacts and from enchantments. This effect doesn’t remove Sword of Sugar and Spice.
Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card. You gain life equal to the discarded card’s mana value.
{T}: You gain life equal to equipped creature’s power, then sacrifice Sword of Sugar and Spice.
Equip {2}

Vigilance
{2}, {T}: Choose one—
• You may sacrifice another Food. If you do, Tyrant of Rotisserie Ridge fights target creature you don’t control.
• You may sacrifice Tyrant of Rotisserie Ridge. If you do, you gain 3 life.
• Tyrant of Rotisserie Ridge gains indestructible until end of turn.

Flying
When Frosted Flamespitter enters create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{B}{R}, Sacrifice a Food: Frosted Flamespitter deals 3 damage to any target. You gain 3 life.

{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast Food or Chef spells or activate the abilities of Foods and Chefs.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Bagels and Mox: You gain 3 life.
cards.notes:
Changed art, added legnedary supertype
By Andrew

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Blood Pudding, Discard a card: You gain 3 life and draw a card.

When Kraken Roll enters, create two Food tokens. [i](They’re artifacts with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a Food, create a 1/1 blue Tentacle creature token.
